com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.errors

Class WZPlatformError

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.errors.WZError
      • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.errors.WZPlatformError

  • public class WZPlatformError
extends WZError
    The error code identifiers for the Android-specific API classes. Errors are normally reported as part of the WZStatus object returned by many of the API methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Constructor Detail

      • WZPlatformError

        public WZPlatformError(int errorCode)
        The constructor for errors in this class. You should not need to use this under normal circumstances.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - One of the error code specifiers defined by this class

      • WZPlatformError

        public WZPlatformError(int errorCode,
                       boolean isWarning)
        The constructor for errors in this class. You should not need to use this under normal circumstances.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - One of the error code specifiers defined by this class
        isWarning - indicates if the error can be considered just a warning

      • WZPlatformError

        public WZPlatformError(int errorCode,
                       Exception exception)
        The constructor for errors in this class with an associated exception. You should not need to use this under normal circumstances.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - One of the error code specifiers defined by this class
        exception - An exception to associate with this error
